Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class cupp::kernel_magic::forward_param< T >

Used by cupp::kernel to pass parameters.

Author:
David Vandevoorde and Nicolai M. Josuttis in the book "C++ Templates - The Complete Guide"

Jens Breitbart modified the original template to better fit our requirements

Version:
0.1
Date:
23.06.2007
forward_param<T>::type is
  • constant reference for all types
  • a dummy type for type void
